contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1436-2017 to designate 610 Markham Street (Robert Watt House) (Trinity-Spadina, Ward 19) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

By-law 1436-2017 - To designate the property at 610 Markham Street West (Robert Watt House) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and  610 Markham Street (Robert Watt House) City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1436-2017 - 610 Markham Street (Robert Watt House)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
